tool_description:
Welcome to the Text to Waveform API, a unique tool that allows you to convert any text (up to 100 characters) into a visual waveform representation. This API provides two endpoints for generating both linear and circular waveforms
texttowaveform.com

api_list.name: Circular Waveform
api_list.description:
The /circular_waveform endpoint allows you to generate a circular waveform from any input text. This endpoint provides a more artistic representation of the audio signal, wrapping the linear waveform around a circle.

To use this endpoint, send a POST request with the text you want to convert in the request body. The text must be a string of up to 100 characters. The API will return a PNG image of the circular waveform.

This endpoint is a great choice for creating visually striking images for album covers, social media posts, or any other application where you want to represent text in a unique and visually appealing way. It's also a fun way to visualize audio data in music visualizers, DJ software, or other creative projects.

import requests

url = "https://text-to-waveform-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/circular_waveform"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-waveform-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Waveform
api_list.description:
The /waveform endpoint allows you to generate a linear waveform from any input text. This endpoint provides a traditional representation of the audio signal, showing changes in amplitude over time. It's perfect for visualizing the rhythm and intensity of the spoken text.

To use this endpoint, send a POST request with the text you want to convert in the request body. The text must be a string of up to 100 characters. The API will return a PNG image of the linear waveform.

This endpoint is ideal for applications where you need a standard, time-based visualization of audio data, such as audio editing software, music streaming platforms, or educational tools.
